updater.selfupdater
Class SoftwareSelfUpdater

java.lang.Object
  updater.selfupdater.SoftwareSelfUpdater

public class SoftwareSelfUpdater
extends java.lang.Object

This is a self updater for software launcher. When the software launcher need to update itself but failed due to file locking on itself, this is used. The launcher will launch this and exit (to release the file lock on the itself), then this self updater will replace the launcher with the updated one.

Author:
Chan Wai Shing

Field Detail

maxExecutionTime

protected static long maxExecutionTime
The maximum execution time allowed (in ms). When the updater first failed, it will not give up immediately, because the program may not exit so quickly after launching this. In this case, the program will keep trying until this maximum execution time is reached. This is configurable by placing '/config.xml' inside the jar, for more information, see the code below.

Constructor Detail

SoftwareSelfUpdater

protected SoftwareSelfUpdater()
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The format of the replacement file: One row for destination file path, one row for new file path. Example:

C:\software\dest.txt
C:\tmp\dest.tmp.txt
C:\software\dest.jar
C:\tmp\dest.tmp.jar
(a new line character here)

Parameters:
args - 0: lock file path, 1: replacement file path, start from 2: command and arguments to launch the software.

releaseQuietly

public static void releaseQuietly(java.nio.channels.FileLock fileLock)
Release the file lock quietly without throwing any exception

Parameters:
fileLock - the file lock to release

closeQuietly

Parameters:
closeable - the object with closable

Throws:
